text: <FI> There were hangings of<Fi>  white <FI>cloth<Fi> , <FI>of<Fi>  green, and <FI>of<Fi> blue, fastened with cords of fine linen and purple to silver rings and pillars of marble: the couches were of gold and silver, upon a pavement of red, and white, and yellow, and black marble.
name: Esther 1:6
